name: PantheonMMO Old Forums Dark
description:
A dark gray style for the official Pantheon MMO (pre-release) forums.

This is a very quick re-color and the user profile / messages & notifications pages are not styled since I rarely use those.  Apparently these forums will be replaced soon so it didn't seem worth it to invest any further in it.
additional_info:
1.2 - Fixed topic post separator border
1.1 - Added dark style for topic and quick reply form
1.0 - Base dark style for reading /forum
